li.p: Google Classroom online learning began March 24
Learn more about getting started with online learning
Please complete a weekly log of your students work at home
2) Complete form and save as a new file OR print and scan/take a picture
3) Email to Darlene Spencer at dspencer@kapschool.org
Find a teacher or staff member with our Faculty Directory and view their Office Hours
Learn more about daily food services on campus

div.p: April 6, 2020: Email // Letter from the Superintendent — School holiday Friday & Monday; Temporary closure extended indefinitely
March 31, 2020: Email // Letter from the Superintendent: School closed until May 4, 2020
March 26, 2020: Email // Letter from the Superintendent — "Stay at Home, Work Safe" — Form to Log Hours — Counseling Resources
March 24, 2020: Email // Letter from the Superintendent: COVID-19 Update
March 24, 2020: Email // Letter from the Principal: Virtual Classroom Instructions
March 21, 2020: Email // Letter from the Superintendent: COVID-19 Update
March 21, 2020: Email // Student Instructional Needs Survey
March 16, 2020: Email // Letter from the Superintendent: School Closure Until April 6
March 13, 2020: Email // Letter from the Superintendent: Monitoring COVID-19

p.a: Help for families with littler ones at home (K-5 curriculum ideas)
